about.title: About us
about.description: We created this platform for those who strive for knowledge, confidence, and new achievements. Here, you will find everything you need for studying, communication, and support on the way to entering colleges, universities, and other educational institutions. Our project is a place where dreams turn into plans, and plans turn into reality!

mentor.title: Become a Mentor
mentor.content: Share your knowledge and experience by helping others develop useful skills. Join educational programs in your region and contribute to building a stronger learning community.

support.title: Share with others
support.content: Tell your friends and network about our initiatives, take part in events, and help spread the idea of quality education throughout society.

learn.title: Start Learning
learn.content: Choose engaging courses and workshops to expand your knowledge and discover new directions. Learning is simple and inspiring!

community.title: Communication and mutual support
community.content: We are not just an information platform ‚Äî we are a place where everyone can share experiences and be inspired by others‚Äô stories.

flexibility.title: Flexibility in learning
flexibility.content: You choose how to learn: join online classes, take tests, or watch lesson recordings.

skills.title: Skill development
skills.content: Beyond admissions, we help develop essential skills for study and life: teamwork, public speaking, problem solving, and time management.

availability.title: Available 24/7
availability.content: We‚Äôre always here for you! Ask questions, get support, and find answers whenever it‚Äôs convenient for you.

mentors.title: Top mentors
mentors.content: Experienced specialists will help you understand complex topics, create study plans, and even prepare for important exams.

safe_space.title: Safe and friendly space
safe_space.content: We ensure that communication on the platform is welcoming and respectful. Be yourself, share ideas and opinions without fear of judgment.

news.societyText: News related to society: events, social initiatives, interviews, and much more.
news.techText1: On July 5, our team visited the Open Day at ITPU. The event was top-notch ‚Äî very interesting and useful. They discussed problems faced by university graduates, where to gain first work experience, and possible solutions.
news.techText2: On June 14, our team attended the powerful event Fu**up Talks at School 21. The speakers shared what to do and what not to do in a startup. It was honest, useful and inspiring.
news.cultureText: On May 17, the first large-scale Agile conference in Uzbekistan took place in Tashkent ‚Äî Agile Scale & Innovation 2025. Our startup took part in it. Great insights, networking and motivation!

edu.heading: Education ‚Äî Challenges and Perspectives
edu.title1: Problems of the Education System in Uzbekistan
edu.content1: The education system in Uzbekistan is facing a number of serious challenges. Despite ongoing reforms, schools and universities still suffer from a shortage of qualified staff, outdated teaching materials, and a lack of modern technology. The situation is especially difficult in rural and remote areas where access to quality education is limited. Many teachers continue using outdated methods, and textbooks do not meet current standards. Improving the situation requires a comprehensive strategy including investment in teacher training, curriculum updates, and infrastructure development.
edu.title2: Current Situation in Schools and Universities
edu.content2: In recent years, both the government and private initiatives have made visible efforts to improve education. Digital tools such as electronic gradebooks and online learning platforms are being implemented in schools. Universities are switching to credit-module systems, giving students more flexibility. However, teachers often struggle to adapt to these new systems. Volunteer projects, private courses, and learning centers are growing and help fill the gaps in knowledge. Still, these efforts need broader governmental support to achieve sustainable impact.
edu.title3: Main Difficulties the Education System Faces
edu.content3: Key problems include chronic underfunding, outdated facilities, and lack of ongoing training for teachers. Educational institutions are often overcrowded, especially in urban areas, leading to lower teaching quality. Additionally, many academic programs focus heavily on theory and do not provide students with practical skills for the labor market. Psychological support for students is also lacking, especially during high-pressure periods like exams. A strategic, systemic approach is necessary to overcome these challenges and ensure better learning outcomes.

educationNews.title: The Future of Education in Uzbekistan
educationNews.content: In November 2025, the first national conference dedicated to educational reforms was held in Tashkent. The event covered key modernization areas: the introduction of digital textbooks and online platforms, teacher training in new technologies, and the development of standards aligned with global education systems. Representatives from the Ministry of Education, private schools, and international experts emphasized the importance of a comprehensive reform strategy.

educationNews.title: Fundraising for Educational Initiatives
educationNews.content: Groups of education enthusiasts such as 'EduFuture' and 'Smart Schools Uzbekistan' launched social media fundraising campaigns. Hundreds of citizens participated, raising funds for interactive boards, tablets, and laptops for rural schools. Additionally, training seminars were conducted for teachers working in remote regions, enhancing the quality of instruction.

educationNews.title: Programs Supporting Gifted Students
educationNews.content: New initiatives were launched under the national talent development program to support gifted students. A student startup competition was held in Tashkent, with winners receiving scholarships to attend IT schools. Mentorship programs began in Samarkand and Fergana, offering students personalized guidance from professors at leading international universities.

news1.title: New Educational Centers Open in Regions
news1.content: As part of the 2024 program to improve the quality of education, the government announced the opening of new educational centers in every region of Uzbekistan. The first centers have already launched in Tashkent, Samarkand, and the Fergana region. These institutions offer extra classes in math, languages, and IT fields.

news2.title: Volunteer Education Projects Are Expanding
news2.content: The 'Ilim' project in Tashkent has doubled its student reach in just one year. The 'Knowledge is Power' project in Samarkand has collected over 10 million soums worth of educational materials and equipment. All of this was achieved through volunteer initiatives and public support.

news3.title: Build a School for the Future Program
news3.content: Launched at the end of 2024, the 'Build a School for the Future' initiative allows citizens of Uzbekistan to contribute to the construction and equipping of new schools. Donations go toward building classrooms, purchasing lab equipment, and creating comfortable learning environments.

ai_usage.title: How to use the AI assistant for learning
ai_usage.note: ‚ö†Ô∏è Remember: AI is a tool, not a replacement for independent learning!

steps.title: 1. Open the AI assistant
steps.description: Go to the assistant page and choose a category: tasks, tests, topic explanations, etc.

steps.title: 2. Formulate your question
steps.description: Write a clear and specific question. For example: ‚ÄúExplain what a derivative is‚Äù or ‚ÄúHelp me solve an equation.‚Äù

steps.title: 3. Get the answer and learn
steps.description: The AI will give you an explanation, solution, or step-by-step guide. Use it to study, not as a cheat sheet.

steps.title: 4. Apply your knowledge
steps.description: After receiving the answer ‚Äî test yourself, repeat the material, ask follow-up questions.

steps.title: 5. Use AI responsibly
steps.description: AI is a learning tool. Don‚Äôt use it to cheat. It's meant to help you understand and grow.

steps.title: 6. Get the most from AI by using it wisely
steps.description: Consistent and honest use of AI helps deepen understanding and build critical thinking skills.
